'''Lightning Rose''' is an [[Character Card Elemental Burst|Elemental Burst]] for [[Lisa (Character Card)|Lisa]] in [[Genius Invokation TCG]].

==Gameplay Notes==
* The Elemental Burst itself can not use up the Conductive stacks, only the identically named Summon can.
